audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club & University of Illinois Glee Club Combine Concert - 1964 November 07
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).
audio_item.dc.rights.copyright: This recording may be protected by copyright law. audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 30] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Tape 1 of 2; University of Illinois performs: Praise Ye The Lord; Hymne; Steersman, Leave the Watch!; Oh What Delight; Arriero, Canta!; The Boatmen's Dance; Voyagers; Big Ten Medley. The Michigan Men's Glee Club performs: Laudes Atque Carmina; O Magnum Mysterium; Tobacco; Glory to God in the Highest. Selections by the Arbors: Let Beauty Awake; The Infinite Shining Heaven; She's Like a Swallow; A Taste of Honey; Little Brown Jug; Garota de Ipanema; Luck, Be a Lady; Michigan Songs; Presentation to Alumni of Outstanding Achievement Awards by President Harlan Hatcher. Both Glee Clubs perform their University's Alma Maters: Hail to the Orange; The Yellow and Blue.
